name: giftmanager
description: GiftManager is a self-hosted app for organizing gift ideas, budgets, and purchase tracking for events like holidays or birthdays. It provides lists, budgets, and reminders through a lightweight web UI.
features: Gift Organization: Maintain lists of gift ideas for friends and family organized by person and occasion.
Budget Tracking: Set and monitor gift budgets for holidays, birthdays, and special events.
Purchase Management: Track which gifts have been purchased, wrapped, and delivered.
Event Reminders: Receive notifications for upcoming birthdays, holidays, and gift-giving occasions.
Idea Collection: Save gift ideas throughout the year for easy reference when occasions arrive.
Multi-User Support: Share gift lists with family members to coordinate and avoid duplicate purchases.
Lightweight Interface: Manage gifts through a simple, intuitive web UI.
Privacy-Focused: Keep gift plans and budgets private on your own self-hosted infrastructure.
